lessons.japanese: それ以来彼らの消息は不明だ。
lessons.english: They have never been heard of since.

lessons.japanese: それ以来、彼の消息を聞いていない。
lessons.english: He has not been heard of since.

lessons.japanese: 私はそれ以来彼の消息は聞いていない。
lessons.english: I haven't heard from him since then.

lessons.japanese: あの人はアメリカへ立ったまま消息がない。
lessons.english: Nothing has been heard from him since he left for America.

lessons.japanese: 消息筋によると、○○社は東証一部への上場を準備している。
lessons.english: According to informed sources, ____ Ltd. is preparing for the move up to the first section of the Tokyo Stock exchange.

lessons.japanese: 新聞に飛行機が消息を絶ったと書いてあった。
lessons.english: I read in the newspaper that contact with the plane had been lost.

lessons.japanese: 新聞に飛行機が消息を絶ったと書いてあった。
lessons.english: The newspaper said that contact with the plane had been lost.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は５年前に家を出たきりで、その後何の消息もありません。
lessons.english: She left home five years ago, and has never been heard of since.

lessons.japanese: 彼は３年前に家を出たきり全然消息がない。
lessons.english: He went away from home three years ago, and has never been heard of since.

lessons.japanese: 年賀状のおかげで私達は友達や親戚の消息が分かる。
lessons.english: New Year's cards provide us with the opportunity to hear from friends and relatives.

lessons.japanese: 田中君からこの半年間何の消息もない。
lessons.english: I haven't heard from Tanaka for the last six months.

lessons.japanese: 私はそれ以来彼の消息は聞いていない。
lessons.english: I haven't heard from him since then.
